mapper.select: select * from team where TEAMID=#{id} and TEAMPASSWORD=#{password}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select a.* from TEAMBOARD a, team b where b.teamName=#{teamName} and a.teamcode=b.teamcode order by boardNumber desc) c) d where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <=#{endRow}
select teamId from team where teamId=#{teamId}
select teamName from team where teamId=#{teamName}
select a.* from teamMember a, team b where b.teamName=#{teamName} and a.teamcode=b.teamcode
select count(*) from teamBoard a, team b where b.teamName=#{teamName} and a.teamcode=b.teamcode order by boardNumber asc
